EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Chicago_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Chicago, IL. For those attending the Data Science Workshop, please remember to bring your own laptop.
Date: Tuesday, May 23, 2017
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 4:00pm Data Science Workshop
Location:
1871 222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza #1212, Chicago, IL 60654 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1871/@41.8883105,-87.6375646,17z/data=!4m8!1m2!2m1!1s222+W+Merchandise+Mart+Plaza+%231212,+Chicago,+IL+60654!3m4!1s0x880e2cb6fb22d371:0x40547b2a8f2c295!8m2!3d41.888369!4d-87.635364]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda here <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
There is discounted parking at the 210 N. Wells Self-Park Garage for 1871 tenants and guests!
$8.00: Monday – Friday: enter between 3:00pm – 11:59pm, out by 8:00am
$14.00: For up to 12 hours of parking anytime
Entering the garage:
- For directions to the garage, please visit http://www.210nwells.com/directions. Entrances are located on Wells Street and Post Place (between Franklin Street and Wells Street). - Enter 210 N. Wells Self-Park and pull a “timed” ticket to lift the gate and park your vehicle. - Take your parking ticket with you for validation at 1871 Reception.
Exiting the garage:
- Stop by 1871 Reception to validate your parking ticket. - At the garage, insert your parking ticket into one of the pay stations in the ground floor lobby. You may pay your parking fee with any major credit card or cash. - The pay station will return your paid ticket to you, which you may then insert at the exit gate. - For any questions regarding parking at 210 N. Wells Self-Park, please contact info@210nwells.com or (312) 263-1535.
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>. Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
